jobDescription: Kelly IT has an opening for a data analyst with our client in Modesto.Duration: 6 monthsSUMMARYQueries and organizes data from databases. Designs, develops and tests software solutions.Maintains large data sets, working within multiple databases, to create functional reports.Develops VBA macros and deploys automation scripts.Responsible for understanding and complying with applicable quality and safety regulatory considerations.REQUIRED SKILLS School Diploma or State-issued equivalency certificate.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, or CIS.Experience with MS Excel at an intermediate level.Strong technical, oral/written communication and analysis/documentation skills.Required to work non-traditional hours during harvest.PREFERRED SKILLSBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, or CIS plus 1 year of laboratory experience.Experience with database design using SQL or other database tools.Experience writing reports, business correspondence, and work procedures.Experience effectively presenting information and responding to questions from groups of managers and customers.Skilled in applying concepts such as fractions, percentages, ratios, and proportions to practical situations.
